features: 【Compatible Models】Bissel steam mop replacement pads fit for Bissell PowerFresh steam mop: 1940 1806 1440 1544 2685A 2075 Series, models 19401 19402, 19404, 19405, 19408, 19409, 1940A, 1940F, 1940Q, 1940T, 1940W, B0006, B0017,15441, 15443, 15446, 15448, 1544A, 1544B, 2685A, 2075A, 2181, 2814. Compare to Part number - 5938 & 203-2633, 1606668 and 1606669.
【Two Types of Pads】4 PACK bissell powerfresh steam mop pads included. 2 soft microfiber mop pads for everyday cleaning, 2 soft microfiber mop pads with scrubbing strips for tough, stickier messes.

【Effective Cleaning】 bissell 1806 replacement pads with super strong water absorption, won't leave water stains on the floor and won't push dirt around. Anti-scratch, strong decontamination, non-depilation, durable and easy to clean, machine washable reusable.
【Fit for All Floors】Bissel steam mop cleaner pads are ideal for all kinds of floors and surfaces, including wooden floor, ceramic tile, laminate floor, marble floor, carpet, etc.
【Easy to Remove & Install】bissell 1940a steam mop pads signed with a quick-grip release tab for easier and cleaner mop pad removal. You can get back to cleaning as soon as possible!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Replacement for the Bissell steam mop
reviews.reviewText: The material is a bit thinner compared to the OEM Bissel but when using it; it's almost the same compared to the OEM. Cleaned just as well and had no issues cleaning my house. Didn't slip off of the mop and stayed in place. Comparing it to the original mob fabric I would say it's comparable. Definitely a great alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good set of steam mop pads
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these steam mop replacement pads and have been impressed with their quality.I received 4 pad in the package - 2 scrubby pads and 2 regular pads. All 4 came bundled together in a vacuum sealed bag. The product said "Made in China"I own a Bissell 2685a steam mop and it came with only scrubby pads.Comparing the OEM scrubby pad to this pad, the Bissell scrubby pad weighs 77g and these replacement pads weigh 72g each. So they are a little bit lighter and feel slightly thinner. I did not see any difference in performance though. Both the Bissell pads and these pads worked great.The 2 regular mop pads weighed 54g each. I had no issues using them and they performed well. I didn't have any non-scrubby Bissell pads to compare these too.One difference in construction is on the Bissell pad, the tag is in the back. On these products, the tag is in the front. I think the tags are used to help remove the pad from the mop head and worked well. One caveat is that the tag on these replacement heads is smaller and I had to make sure it is exposed so I could grab it.All of these pads fit my Bissell 2685a mop head with no issues and I’d recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it you won't regret it. Fit my Bissell 2685A perfectly!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these as I wanted backups ( for when I had large jobs which I do often for work,) I would not have to stop to wash them in between.They arrived quickly and with a funky smell, but it washed right out and to my surprise, they work as well if not better than the ones that came with my Bissell.They are a tad thinner but this does not impact the quality of them as they performed miraculously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pads for steam mop work well and good buy. Only thing they don't do is the labor!
reviews.reviewText: Upon receiving a set of four, I examined each steam mop pad. Each pad featured elastic around the circular portion, while the straight side lacked this feature. These pads flawlessly fit my steam mop. Installing them was a breeze, and once in place, they securely stayed put during use. The pads also proved to be easily rinsed out. I was pleased with their performance, as they efficiently tackled the task of cleaning my hardwood floors. Although the process of mopping and waxing can be laborious, the steam mop, aided by these pads, made the job more manageable.The only downside, if it can be called that, is that the efficient cleaning prowess of the steam mop and these pads leaves me with little motivation to complete the once-daunting task of mopping and waxing.Good item and a recommended choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They don't stay quite as flat to the machine as the original, with the ends curling down a bit, but once in place it doesn't seem to make a difference. There haven't been any issues, and they haven't fallen off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than originals
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't really expecting much from these, but I was impressed. These fit so much better than the original ones that came with my Bissell Mop steamer. The original ones, I felt I had to really stretch to get around the edges and corners of the bottom of it but these fit on with no problem and I had no issues with them being too big or saggy either. These do a really good job of absorbing a lot of dirt. They are washable and made of excellent quality as I didn't have any problems with the seams or stitching coming apart. Overall wonderful replacements for your steamer mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit but decreased quality in material
reviews.reviewText: I am still rating this a 5 star item since it offers 10 in a pack that you can do a lot of mopping without having to wash every other pads because you only have two pairs. This way, you can continuously mop without being interrupted with washing the other ones but instead you can wash them all at the same time and be done with the mopping. At least 12 pairs is enough for my needs and more effective use of my time. I didn’t have to wait for other rags to be dirty so I could put them all in the wash at the same time. The quality may be less than the original microfiber but it still cleans the same way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the brand replacements
reviews.reviewText: I got these because they were a more reasonable price than the brand replacements, and they fit perfectly. I really don't see any difference in these at all. There are two soft covers and two with the gray scrubby stripes. Like the original set, they wash and dry easily. They are just more economical. And who doesn't like that?

These mop replacement pads come vacuum sealed.The mop pads are sewn for the Bissell mops that includes a separate fabric stitching for the sides of the mop, giving a snug fitting.The seams are wrapped to prevent fraying. One side has an elastic band sewn in.The mop material is strong. The pads are double lined and very absorbent. The pads come in a four pack: You have two plain microfiber pads,and two microfiber pads with a scrubbing strips. The scrubbing strips are made of plastics and are very good at removing light stains.Overall, these are great mop replacement pads.

I already got a steam mop for my home and I was using it for quite a while, I needed some more mops now and I found them . There is elastic around this mop ( which was missing from my first mop) and I like that as it don’t allow to move mop under the stick.The quality is nice and these are easy to clean as well

The 4 Pack Steam Mop Replacement Pads for Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop have completely transformed my cleaning experience. These replacement pads are a game-changer, offering exceptional quality and performance that breathe new life into my trusty steam mop.First and foremost, the compatibility with the Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop is spot-on. The pads fit seamlessly onto the mop, providing a secure and snug attachment that ensures efficient cleaning every time. The ease of installation means I spend less time fumbling with replacements and more time enjoying the benefits of a freshly cleaned home.The material of these replacement pads is top-notch. They are crafted from high-quality microfiber, which not only makes them durable but also highly effective in trapping dirt, dust, and debris. The result is a thorough and efficient cleaning process that leaves my floors sparkling and sanitized.What sets these replacement pads apart is their versatility. Whether I'm dealing with tough, stuck-on messes or simply doing a routine clean, these pads handle it all. The microfiber design ensures that they glide smoothly across various floor surfaces, from hardwood to tile, leaving nothing but cleanliness in their wake.The absorption capabilities of the microfiber pads are impressive. They effortlessly lift and lock in dirt, grime, and even spills, leaving floors dry and ready for use in no time. This is especially beneficial for busy households where quick cleanup is essential.The longevity of these replacement pads is noteworthy. They endure multiple uses and washes without showing signs of wear and tear. The fact that they are machine-washable is a huge plus, making maintenance a breeze and adding to their overall value.In terms of value for money, the 4 Pack Steam Mop Replacement Pads offer an affordable solution for keeping my floors in pristine condition. The pack includes an ample supply of replacement pads, ensuring that I always have a clean one ready for use.In conclusion, the 4 Pack Steam Mop Replacement Pads Compatible with Bissell Powerfresh Steam Mop have exceeded my expectations. They deliver on durability, efficiency, and value, making them an essential accessory for anyone seeking to elevate their steam cleaning routine. Say goodbye to worn-out pads and hello to a consistently spotless home with these reliable replacements. Highly recommended!

These are great mop heads. I don’t use them on my steam mop, just on my regular swifter. They fit fine and clean well. They are easy to wash, and they wash well. They catch a lot of dirt and hair. I have texture floors and they get inbetween the groves well. Overall a good cleaning product. The 4 pack is worth it because I always have one on hand.

The media could not be loaded. I honestly didn’t realize how dirty my original pads were until I received these replacements – see side-by-side photo comparison. And I had washed the old pads every time I used them, but they are several years old so new ones were overdue.This set contains two each of the two types of pads that originally came with my Bissell model 1940-1 steam mop. Once pad is slightly thicker and is for more textured floors such as the tile I have in my kitchen. The other is thinner and more appropriate (at a lower steam setting) for wood floors.When I first opened the package, I thought there was a sizing problem – again, see the side-by-side photo, but it just turns out that the elastic on my old pads had stretched considerably. These new ones fit much tighter and more like they are supposed to.They have a small pouch on the inside where you can put a fragrance puck, though I don’t use those.I did a quick job on my kitchen floor and even though it had been done not that long ago, the pad did pick up some additional dirt. The steam seems to go through the pad well and it picks up, rather than spreads around stains on the floor. As with any steam mop, the floor should be well vacuumed first.
